titleStmt.title: A narrative panegyrical of the life, sickness, and death, of George ... Lord Bishop of Derry in Ireland as it was delivered at his funerals in the Cathedral Church of the Holy Trinity (commonly called Christ Church) in Dublin on Friday the 12th of January, Anno Domini 1665/6 / by R. Mossom ...
titleStmt.author: Mossom, Robert, d. 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb, and are to be sold by Timothy Garthwait ...,
